      • _in

        public ActorManager _in()
        Description copied from interface: IManager
        Go into child editorManager. The returned editorManager copes with current pointer object. To exit back to previous editorManager which is called "parent editorManager", you can call _out().
        Specified by:
        _in in interface IManager<Actor,Actor>
        Overrides:
        _in in class PieceManager<Actor>
        Returns:
        Child editorManager object.
